page.title: 10A Hard days work -part 1
page.content: {7.30 am.}Yawn yawn!time for breakfast. "Next one!" shouts Mum.Me next;catlick wash,quick brush of teeth,time for my hair to be done.I slip on my coat and shoes,and run up to Sarah's.We go to the shop and Sarah buys a paper and lunch.Walk to school-"Alison did you have to ring the bell?!!!".All in the cloakroom."Right children,do 2 exercises today."(groan,groan)Finished Oh goody,time for assembly - brilliant Pastor Neal."That was great." "Group 1 calculators." "Mr.Gray,I don't understand this page.Mr.Gray,you have forgotten the register." Each teacher in the school has a register and calls our name.{10.40.Playtime.}We play skipping and sometimes Castle Morris.A teacher is on duty.At 10.55 a whistle goes.We all line up and walk into class.When we are all quiet Mr.Gray tells us what to do next.
